content:
Define a 4-bit output register 'out' to hold the output of the multiplexer.

Retrieved Related Information:
- out: 4-bit output that outputs the selected data input or 0 (Type:Signal)
- When sel is 0, out = data0 (Type:StateTransition)
- When sel is 1, out = data1 (Type:StateTransition)
- When sel is 2, out = data2 (Type:StateTransition)
- When sel is 3, out = data3 (Type:StateTransition)
- When sel is 4, out = data4 (Type:StateTransition)
- When sel is outside 0 to 5, out = 0 (Type:StateTransition)

Implement combinational logic to select data0 when sel is 0.

Retrieved Related Information:
- sel: 3-bit input used to select one of the six data inputs.
- data0: 4-bit input representing data for selection 0.
- When sel is 0, out = data0.
source: input  sel   (3 bits), input  data0 (4 bits)

content:
Implement combinational logic to select data1 when sel is 1.

Retrieved Related Information:
- sel: 3-bit input used to select one of the six data inputs.
- data1: 4-bit input representing data for selection 1.
- out: 4-bit output that outputs the selected data input or 0.
- When sel is 1, out = data1.
source: input  sel   (3 bits), input  data1 (4 bits)

content:
Implement combinational logic to output 0 when sel is greater than 5.

Retrieved Related Information:
- sel: 3-bit input used to select one of the six data inputs (Type:Signal)
- When sel is outside 0 to 5, out = 0 (Type:StateTransition)
